turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have a black and white mocha venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to pick up your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up in Nashville location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is this the location at 424 Church St Suite 110?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it is at 402 21st Ave S.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pick up at the location 402 21st Ave S?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: At what time would you like to pick up the Venti black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up in an hour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to pick it up at 1:20pm?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at 1:30pm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add a Petite?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, but can I add extra whipped cream on my drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Venti black and white mocha with extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be all for your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I have a Venti black and white mocha with extra whipped cream to be picked up at 1:30pm at 402 21st Ave S. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Please present your reciept at pick up for your order. Enjoy your day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, goodbye!
